title: Your patch literally crashed my computer.
body:
Really don't know why you guys need that much space requirement, but it's not like my computer is that shitty. I've been able to run League just fine on this computer at 50-58 fps for 5 years now. No, I wasn't updating nor running anything else, I opened task manager and saw that the fucking client was using 92% of my disk space alone. 

What gives Riot?
